fields.Name: Environment Variable
fields.Description: Retrieves encryption keys from environment variables. Keys should be base64-encoded. For AES-256, generate with: openssl rand -base64 32
fields.ConfigTemplate: {"envVarName": "string - The name of the environment variable containing the base64-encoded key"}

fields.Name: Configuration File
fields.Description: Retrieves encryption keys from the mj.config.cjs encryptionKeys section. Keys should be base64-encoded. Not recommended for production - use environment variables or a secrets manager instead.
fields.ConfigTemplate: {"keyName": "string - The key name in the encryptionKeys section of mj.config.cjs"}

fields.Name: AWS KMS
fields.Description: Retrieves encryption keys from AWS Key Management Service (KMS). Uses envelope encryption - store the base64-encoded CiphertextBlob from GenerateDataKey as the lookup value. Requires @aws-sdk/client-kms package and AWS credentials.
fields.ConfigTemplate: {"lookupValue": "string - Base64-encoded encrypted data key (CiphertextBlob from KMS GenerateDataKey)"}

fields.Name: Azure Key Vault
fields.Description: Retrieves encryption keys from Azure Key Vault secrets. Store the base64-encoded key as a secret value. Requires @azure/keyvault-secrets and @azure/identity packages and Azure credentials.
fields.ConfigTemplate: {"lookupValue": "string - Full secret URL (https://vault.vault.azure.net/secrets/name) or secret name if AZURE_KEYVAULT_URL is set"}
